name: Widelands Game File
summary: Learn about .WGF files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: After beginning gameplay, WGF files are saved with a corresponding .WRPL file, which records all player commands from the starting condition. WGF files can also be seen with the multiple file extension .WRPL.WGF.

description: Saved game created by Widelands, an open source strategy game where players build settlements and battle other tribes; contains the initial saved state for a game; used to record the starting conditions for a game.
